title: "Adlumin Goes Live in Amazon Web Services (AWS) Marketplace"
excerpt: "Adlumin launched its company listing in AWS Marketplace, providing financial institution customers with another channel to acquire the security and compliance automation platform. AWS Marketplace is a curated digital catalog that features software listings from independent software vendors."
